entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -24.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -24.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -31.5°C
Wind: W 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
